titleStmt.title: A moste pythye and excellent epistell to anymate all trew Christians vnto the crosse of Chryste, translated out off ffre[n]che [sic] into ynglyshe by Robert Pownoll. With a preface to the reader.
titleStmt.author: Pownall, Robert, 1520-1571.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
